buildCommand: mkdir -p apps/web/src/utils/__generated__ && cd apps/web && SKIP_WORKERD=true NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=true CI=false yarn build:production && mv build/* ../build/ && rmdir build
installCommand: yarn install --ignore-engines --network-timeout 100000 && cd apps/web && yarn add -D env-cmd
